p: The activity of POD was evaluated according to the method described by Chance and Maehly [ 40], with moderate adjustments. In total, 0.1 mL of the enzyme extract was mixed with 1.875 mL phosphate buffer (50 mM; pH 7.0), 1 mL H 2O 2 (30 mM), and 0.025 mL 2-methoxyphenol. The absorbance was recorded nine times (20 s each time) at 470 nm ( UV-2450, Shimadzu, Kyoto, Japan). The activity of POD (1 unit) was estimated as the quantity of enzyme needed for a 0.01-unit increase in OD within 1 min.
